Package kodingProject

Class SteamGameReviews

java.lang.Object
kodingProject.SteamGameReviews
public class SteamGameReviews
extends Object
This is a SteamGameReviews Class for retrieving "Review", "Game Title", "Review Date", "How many found helpful" & "Game Hours"
Author:
Chang Hua, Zhan An, Wei Xiang, Jing Wei
